summary:
Utilizes ENBSeries Localization feature Boris implemented in v0.304.
Displays info for all settings in enblocal.ini, enbseries.ini and all shader files, while in game and hovering the mouse button over any given setting.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#4F81BD]This "mod" was created to expand the learning material content available for ENBSeries, and obviously make it easily available when it's needed. In-game directly without needing to Alt+Tab out of the game to read some info about a specific setting.[/color][/size]


[color=#938953][size=5][b]INSTALLATION
[/b][/size][/color]
[list=1][color=#EEECE1][*][size=2]First download the 7z folder from this page, open it up and then extract it to this location, just an location example;[/size]
[size=2]-> C:\Program Files (x86)\[u]Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\enbseries
[/u][/size]
[*][size=2]Make sure you have downloaded ENBSeries v0.304 or newer and extracted all necessary files including this file;[/size]
[size=2]-> enbfontunicode.png[/size]
[/color][/list]

[color=#938953][size=5][b]FEATURES
[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#EEECE1][size=2] This allows all settings found in the enblocal.ini, enbseries.ini, shader .fx files and weather system .ini files to display info notes on what it does, the performance impact it has and download links to required files for specific effects etc, etc.
I will also have shader files covered, there isn't much content in Boris default shader files but it has been covered since initial release.

For other custom shader files from various ENB presets, I will not add info to them personally, that is the job of the preset author. I will only supply them with a base file to add proper info to[/size][/color]


[color=#938953][size=5][b]HOW TO USE
[/b][/size][/color]
[list=1][color=#EEECE1][*][size=2]Enable and disable the Localization feature via the in-game ENBSeries GUI menu.[/size]

[*][size=2]While in-game hold Shift and press Enter to open up the ENBSeries GUI menus.[/size]

[*][size=2]When that has opened up you should now see three windows. Go to the 2nd one, under the one that is in the upper left corner.[/size]

[*][size=2]In that window you should something labeled DisableLocalization.[/size]
[/color][/list]


[color=#938953][size=5][b]CREDITS
[/b][/size][/color]
[b][url=http://enbdev.com/]Boris[/url][/b] - The brains and creator of the ENBseries.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3090411/?]TechAngel85[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/734837/?]Aiyen[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/125656/?]ConfidenceMan[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5548081/?]Jafin16[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1632043/?]Mangaclub[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/151807/?]Matso[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/663989/?]Bronze316[/url][/b] - Guide info additions.
author: --JawZ--

files.name: In-Game ENB Guide
files.changelogHtml:
This version is in a unfinished state, not all settings has info added to them.
However all settings are present and active so you just need to add text that should be displayed in game, if you want to that is.


Changes from v0.4 to v0.5

sections added;
- NIGHTDAY
- ADAPTATION
- BLOOM
- LENS
- SSAO SSIL
- SKYLIGHTING
- ENVIRONMENT
